name: PlusBox-Cooked
description:
Welcome to PlusBox-Cooked!

PlusBox-Cooked is a high-energy co-op game for 4 players that takes place in a futuristic robot-world. You and your fellow robots work in a factory where you are trying to manufacture as many gaming consoles as possible before the end of your shift.

But here is the catch. Each player is assigned to only one button and others use that button to interact with them.

Bring your friends and controllers and try to make those robots succeed in their job!

Have fun :)
